story:
English version 

Още за ЧетворКръг и как се стигна до него

 

Нещо като пленер, нещо като фестивал, нещо като образователна практика и едновременно с това творчески празник – всичките в едно по време на събитията, които провеждаме ежегодно. ЧетворКръг е концептуалната лаборатория за проектирането на тези събития, а тяхната основна цел е преобразяване и претворяване на средата (където се провежда някое от тях) спрямо идеите на предварително избраната идейно-духовна нагласа.

 

Как ни хрумна ЧетворКръг? С много четене, със съдействието на мицела на вдъхновението, безрезервната помощ на мосю Четвъртък (в продължение на повече от година събранията ни протичат предимно в този ден) и неумолимата вътрешна необходимост за изследване на колективни форми на изкуството.

 

Кои сме ние, ЧетворКръгленци?

 

Макар че смятаме всеки участник в нашите събития за член на ЧетворКръг, ядрото е здраво и постоянства както следва – Моника Борисова (художник), Захари Захариев (философ, поет, писател), Деница Боева (художник), Срацимир Баряков (философ и поет), Диан Динев (музикант, фотограф, художник). И всички онези безчет светулки на фантазията, които решават да посветят заедно с нас, когато творим светове.

 

Какво правим ние, лудаците от ЧетворКръг?

 

Най-напред избираме някоя присърцата нам идейно-духовна нагласа или направление в изкуството и културата и със съвместни усилия на ядронния колайдер на ЧетворКръг проучваме основните им идеи и принципи. Избираме място и време за провеждане на събитието, след което започваме да мъдруваме относно начините, по които избраното място и време могат да бъдат преобразувани - тъй щото да отговарят на и изразяват самата идейно-духовна нагласа. Спираме се обаче в тази мъдрост, когато преценим, че сме измислили само рамкиращия проект за преобразуването на средата, тъй щото в събитието ни да остане щедро място за спонтанни и своевременни на протичането му възможности за доизмисляне на онова, което ще правим заедно с гостуващите участници. Провеждаме лекции, семинарно-дискусионни четения на забележителни за избраното движение текстове и на базата на тях измисляме художествени практики, чрез които наученото да бъде осъществено в преобразуване на пространството, атмосферата и отношенията между всички съ-творители - там, където ЧетворКръгленци са избрали фантазията да стане действителност. И накрая – заемаме се с направата на цялостната световъзприетивна сфера на идейно-духовната нагласа, тъй щото тя самата да стане основа и условие за художествено преживяване на всекидневието от страна на всички участници.

 

Тазгодишното събитие на Четворкръг – „Въдворена Магия“ (от 01.07.2017 до 01.09.2017)

 

Тази година ще разгърнем фантастичен свят през идеите и принципите на Магическия реализъм. Ще четем Борхес, Кортасар, Маркес, Павич, може би Радичков, както и други текстове, водещи смислово към магическия реализъм. Ще обсъждаме идеите им и ще ги вкореним и отглеждаме, както се гледат растения, в пространството на една къща и прилежащия й двор в село Камен. Част от рамкиращите проекто-практики, които ядрото на ЧетворКръг предварително е измислило (за да не оставяме спонтанността на самата себе си) са:

 

  • лекции и семнинарно-дискусионни четения на текстове от Магическия реализъм, провеждани от ядрото на ЧетворКръг
  • рисуване, съпроводено със слушане на записана на аудиофайл поезия, близка до, или принадлежаща към самия магически реализъм
  • багрене на платове чрез техника, наречена „Шибури“;
  • поетично-маскарадни разходки (с предварително подготвени необичайни дрехи) до близката река
  • материализиране на фантастични същества по текстове на Борхес под формата на арт инсталации
  • приготвяне на домашна, магическа, нощна лютеница, на която ще четем поезия и на която ще свирим джаз, фънк, блус и други импровизационни дивотии, в съпровод на светлината от десетки свещи разположени из пространството на събитието, за да стане лютеницата наистина психотропна
  • работилница за ръчни тефтери, в които участниците ще бъдат насърчавани да записват сънищата си по време на събитието, като накрая всеки ще получава в собствения си тефтер ръкописните преписи от съновиденията на останалите присъстващи
  • и много други магичности, като – сюрреалистични техники за спонтанно писане, медитации на абсурда (чрез краткотрайно общуване на участниците с четене на фрази от различни книги), планетарно хоро, обръщане на денонощието, и още, че и повече изненади...

 

За какво са ни нужни вашите магически хартийки (още известни като пари)?

 

Материали. Материали. И материали. Та пак! За да осъществим всичко описано и замислено, ще са ни нужни доста художествени и други материали – фазери, бои, четки, тънкописци, около 2000 свещи, въжета и канапи, платове, глина, шантави дрехи, шапки и други дребошлъци, гориво, за да занесем всичко необходимо до мястото на събитието (например - ще носим около 700 книги, които ще разположим на различни места, като разчупена библиотека, из пространството на събитието), пък и немалко труд от наша страна, и още една купа сено съществени нужности :). Тъй като една от основните цели на събитията ни е цялостното всекидневие да се въведе в неговото художествено измерение, ще се погрижим и за наличието на основни хранителни продукти за всички гостуващи участници, тъй че да превърнем и храненето и приготовленията около него във вълшебен, общ акт – та магически хвърковати хартийки ни трябват и за тая работа. Разполагаме с малко по-малко от половината от нужните средства, които ще вложим в случването и ставането на събитието, а ако добрата ви воля настигне, или прехвърли заявеното като необходимо тук, ще ни помогнете да си донабавим нужното за тази година, онова, за началната подготовка на следващото ни събитие догодина, както и за евентуалната регистрация на ЧетворКръг като сдружение за всички по-нататъшни фантастично-поетични светоправения, които замисляме.

 

Какво получавате насреща за вашата доброжелателната помощ?

В дясно на страницата е описано какво ще получите в замяна на вашата помощ от финикийски тип :), а времето на получаване ще бъде между 10 и 20 дни след привършване на събитието, тъй като всички магически дарове ще бъдат изработени по време на протичането на „Въдворена магия“, изпълнени със заряда и лунатичността на онова, което правим. (тоест, очаквайте даровете между 10.09 и 20.09.2019).  Разбира се, може да ни пратите и сума по ваше усмотрение без да избирате някоя от посочените перки - като безвъзмездно дарение (минималният праг е 1$). Отвъд самите дарове и благодараности, отново след привършване на събитието, ще можете да разглеждате снимки и, евентуално - видео материали от събитието (в предоставената връзка към страницата ни във Фейсбук ) и да се радвате, че сте помогнали за случването на подобна естетическа дивотия. При добро стечение на обстоятелствата (разбирайте – при достатъчно добро доплуване на магическите ви хартийки до нас) ще направим изложба с част от създадените по време на събитието художествени предмети в Сливен и, може би, в София, за ставането на което също ще може да се веселите и радвате, и съобщавате тук и там, на тоз и онзи! При най-най-най-добротворните потоци на случването, пък, ще създадем драматургичен текст за постановка, основаващ се на съдържанието на всички записани по време на събитието сънища на участниците и евентуално ще може да се насладите на една лунно-пълна, съновиденческа, театрална церемония на фантазията, която, пак да напомним, вие сте омагьосали до случването й с финикийските си заклинания!

 

Други възможни начини да ни направите магия за помощ

 

Оставили сме връзка към страницата на ЧетворКръг във Фейсбук (най-горе в дясно, щракнете червеното About под заглавието на събитието) и ще се радваме на съвети, въпроси и всякакви други чуденки. Там ще може да ни питате каквото намерите за добре и да разберете повече подробности относно възможността за присъстващо участие на събитието „Въдворена магия“. Всеки от вас може да разпространява събитието във виртуалните социални мрежи или да говори за него в жизнените такива, за да стигнем до възможно повече добромислещи сърца и умове и да направим каквото сме намислили. Всяко разумно и сърцато фантазирано става действително, както не е казал Хегел.Четвъртитите кръгове да са с вас, благодарим

 

 

 English starts here

 

Engardened Magic 

                                      

          ThursdaySquareCircle and magical realism in a village backyard, festival-art-practical-project-performance and other miscellanea,   01. 07.2017 – 01.09.2017, Kamen village, Sliven municipality, Bulgaria       

 

What is ThursdaySquareCircle and how did we get here?      
 


                We call it a core for rooting fantastical realism. Or to put it in other words – an interdisciplinary intellectual circle for creating temporary virtual marvelous worlds. A platform for realizing them. A workshop for vitalizing ideo-spiritual attunements in art and culture, such as romanticism and magical realism. An outdoorsy artistic practical, a festival, an educational method and a celebration of creativity – this is what our yearly events combine and interlace within themselves. ThursdaySquareCircle is the conceptual laboratory which projects these happenings, the main purpose of which is to transform and transmute their immediate surroundings in accordance with the perspectives of the ideo-spiritual attitude being explored.           
                What are the origins of ThursdaySquareCircle? Heaps of reading, generous assistance from the mycelium of inspiration, the unfailing support of Monsieur Thursday (the day when our gatherings have been taking place over the past year), and last, but not least, our unquenchable inborn necessity for exploring collective forms of art.             

 

Who are we, ThursdaySquareCirclers?           



                Though we consider each participant in our events as a rightful member of ThursdaySquareCircle, our core remains strong through the continuous efforts of Monica Borissova (painter), Zahari Zahariev (philosopher, poet, writer), Denitsa Boeva (painter), Stratsimir Baryakov (philosopher, poet) and Dian Dinev (musician, photographer, painter). And all of the countless fireflies of imagination, which join their light with ours when we create worlds...

 

What do we crazyhead ThursdaySquareCirclers do?     

           

                Firstly, we select one of our beloved ideo-spiritual attitudes or a cultural/artistic movement and with the conjoint efforts of the circle‘s mental particle accelerator, we study their main ideas and principles. We choose a place and time for the happening, after which we start figuring out the ways in which the chosen spacetime can be reconfigured so as to suit and express the ideo-spiritual attunement. We stop once we have come upon a fitting frame for the transformative act, as we wish to leave ample space for spontaneous reimaginings which will befall us and the rest of the participants throughout the course of the event itself.  We conduct lectures, seminar readings of representative texts and come up with artistic practices based on those, so that what is learned is enacted in reconfiguring the space, atmosphere and relationship between all co-creators – there were ThursdaySquareCirclers have chosen for imagination to become reality. Finally, we take on ourselves the making of the world-perceiving domain of the ideo-spiritual attunement, so that it may become the basis and condition for the artistic experience of each participant’s daily living.                         

     

 This year’s event by ThursdayFourCircle – Engardened Magic (from 01.07.2017 to 01.09.2017)           


 
 This year, we shall unfold a fantastical world through the ideas and principle of magical realism. We’ll be reading Borges, Cortázar, Márquez, Pavić, Radichkov perhaps, as well as other texts inclined towards magical realism. We will discuss their ideas, root them and look after them, as one would take care of plants, in the space of a house and its yard in the Kamen village. Some of the framing project-practices, which the core of ThursdayFourCircle has pre-envisioned (so as to not leave spontaneity all to itself) are:                     

  • lectures and seminar formatted readings of magical realist texts led by the core of ThursdayFourCircle          
  • drawing under the accompaniment of audio recordings of poetry belonging to or reminiscent of magical realism      
  • textile dyeing using the Shibori technique        
  • poetic masquerade walks to the nearby river (making the use of provided unusual clothing and accessory items)     
  •  materializing Borges’s fantastical creatures in the shape of art installations   
  • making artisanal magical night liutenitsa (traditional Bulgarian chutney prepared from roasted peppers, tomatoes and spices). The process will include performing poetry to it, playing jazz, blues, funk and other improvised forms of madness, all under candlelight, so as to ensure the truly psychotropic quality of the liutenitsa.   
  • a workshop for making dream journals. Throughout the event, the participants will be encouraged to keep a record of their dreams, and by the end of it, they will walk away with a journal containing the handwritten narratives of other participants’ dreams as well.    
  • numerous other marvels, such as: surrealist techniques for spontaneous writing, meditations on the absurd conducted through the aid of reading parts of multiple books in a short time frame, planetary horo (Balkan group dances which wind in various shapes, most often a circle) , day and night reversal and many, oh so many more surprises...                 


What do we need your magical papers (a.k.a. money) for?  



Materials. Materials. And more...materials. Yet again! To realize everything thus far described and thought out, we will require a panoply of artistic and practical supplies - canvases, paints, brushes, fine-liners, around 2000 candles, ropes and strings, fabrics, clay, eccentric clothes and accessories, fuel to transport everything to the event venue (such as the library of 700 books which will be spread across different spaces in our shared place), and a whole lot of other necessities. Not to mention the amount of effort and labor invested in the venture by its organizers. As one of the main goals of our events is to introduce an artistic dimension into our daily life, we will provide basic foodstuffs for all participants, so as to turn eating and its contingent preparations into an enchantment-laden, communal activity, and your magical papers are required to fulfill this intention. Currently, we have a bit under half of the necessary funds to realize the event. Should your generosity satisfy or surpass our estimates, any surplus thus accumulated will be put into the foundations of next year’s event, and maybe even the registration of ThursdayFourCirlce as a company dedicated to our further fantastical poetic worldmaking ventures.          

    

What do you get in return for your benevolent support?                      


To the right you’ll find descriptions of what you’ll receive in return for your shekels. Delivery of the said items will take place between 10 and 20 days of the event’s finale, as all magical gifts will be crafted during its course, and imbued with the charge and lunacy of what we do. That is to say, expect them between 10.09.2017 and 20.09.2017. Beyond that, once our doings are complete, you will be able to look through photos and perhaps even videos of the event on our Facebook page, to elevate your joy of having helped the happening of such an aesthetic curiosity. Should a plentiful rain of shekels fall upon us, we will organize an exhibition of our artistic creations in Sliven, and why not even Sofia? Do share the joy of these by spreading the word amongst the places and people you know! Should the precipitation of giving take us by surprise, we will respond to this flood by writing a theatre screenplay based on our participants’ recorded dreams. So your shekels will also bring you the enjoyment of a spectacle filled with the enchanting powers of the full moon and the visions of our dreamscapes.     

 

Other ways of spellcasting your support of our cause             


There’s a link to ThursdaySquareCircle’s Facebook page provided (click the red About, up and right of the page), we will appreciate and interact with your advice, questions, and miscellaneous ponderings. That’s also the portal through which you can find out more about attending the event as a participant. Each of you can spread the awareness of our doings virtually and by word of mouth, as we dearly want to fulfill our intentions and reach out to more benevolent heartminds out there. Each reasoned and spirited imaginary becomes actuality, as Hegel did not say. May the squared circles be with you, and many thanks!              

 

Indiegogo Perks:   

Here are the perks translated in English in the exact same order as they are in Bulgarian to the right of the page. If you have any questions feel free to contact us (Click the red About on the top right of the page)        

4$ - One Hundred Ants 
The energy, that the ants are producing, Vladimir Vernadsky says(the creator of the notion of Biosphere), is a little bit smaller than the one produced by all the plants on planet Earth. If nothing else stops them(wide water surfaces, other insects and animal species etc.) they would spread out their colonies and seeds for plants across the whole planet for a few years . Lets use their power and be good-willed ants and help us approach our goal a bit by bit  - x100


5$- Unrewarded donation

You shall forever stay in our hearts and minds as helpful elves working towards the cause of ThursdaySquareCircle’s development   

10$ - Unrewarded donation

You shall even forever more stay in our hearts and minds as helpful elves working towards the cause of ThursdaySquareCircle’s development                 
 

15$ - Unrewarded donation

Here the eternity of our gratitude is guaranteed! You will never be forgotten as a good willed elf helper of ThursdaySquareCircle’s development and establishment


20$ - Two jars of magical liutenitsa

Two 800ml jars of liutenitsa made by the event participants. Not just any old liutenitsa though, ours is special! Not only some of the ingredients are home-grown but also, we will play music and read poetry to it, during the night, under candle light – x20

20$ - Decorative hanging (50x70cm)

a Shibori dyed textile piece with additional handcrafted elements to adorn your wall, couch or bed – x10        

50$ - Materializing a  Borges creature

You pick seven days between the 3rd and 20th of August during which you’ll stay with us. In addition to the rest of the activities, you will be at the frontline of creating (with our humble assistance) an installation which brings one of Borges’s marvelous characters into the material domain. Materials, lodging and food all provided, be our guest! – x6   
 

70$ - A4 painting

You’ll receive an A4 painting made whilst the artist is listening to a recording of professional actors reading magical realist poetry. An experimental piece which explores the interaction between poetic language and imagery, with which you can beautify your home, office or atelier and tell the story of how you have become an accomplice in the contemporary European avant-garde art scene – x5   

250$ - 100x70cm painting

A bigger piece created used the above-described technique, with which you can do as you please, but we recommend you keep it for the upcoming 30-40 years and watch its value grow at, mildly put, surprising rates – x5        

350$ - 200x70cm painting

A bigger, longer LivePainted (painted whilst listening to poetry) painting which would make even the most ardent Japanese wall panel enthusiasts go green with envy. Use its marvelous abstractions as an aid to your meditations of contemporary, and may it be so,  meaningful art – x2  

600$- 100x150cm hanging –

A magical textile piece crafted throughout the duration of the event, with the input of multiple of our artists under the skilled supervision of Denitsa Boeva. The hanging you’ll receive will weave within itself the handprints of tens of people, intertwining the energies and meanings of Engardened Magic, so as to deliver them buzzing for your perception to dwell upon – x1
story_txt:
English version Още за ЧетворКръг и как се стигна до него  Нещо като пленер, нещо като фестивал, нещо като образователна практика и едновременно с това творчески празник – всичките в едно по време на събитията, които провеждаме ежегодно. ЧетворКръг е концептуалната лаборатория за проектирането на тези събития, а тяхната основна цел е преобразяване и претворяване на средата (където се провежда някое от тях) спрямо идеите на предварително избраната идейно-духовна нагласа. Как ни хрумна ЧетворКръг? С много четене, със съдействието на мицела на вдъхновението, безрезервната помощ на мосю Четвъртък (в продължение на повече от година събранията ни протичат предимно в този ден) и неумолимата вътрешна необходимост за изследване на колективни форми на изкуството. Кои сме ние, ЧетворКръгленци? Макар че смятаме всеки участник в нашите събития за член на ЧетворКръг, ядрото е здраво и постоянства както следва – Моника Борисова (художник), Захари Захариев (философ, поет, писател), Деница Боева (художник), Срацимир Баряков (философ и поет), Диан Динев (музикант, фотограф, художник). И всички онези безчет светулки на фантазията, които решават да посветят заедно с нас, когато творим светове. Какво правим ние, лудаците от ЧетворКръг? Най-напред избираме някоя присърцата нам идейно-духовна нагласа или направление в изкуството и културата и със съвместни усилия на ядронния колайдер на ЧетворКръг проучваме основните им идеи и принципи. Избираме място и време за провеждане на събитието, след което започваме да мъдруваме относно начините, по които избраното място и време могат да бъдат преобразувани - тъй щото да отговарят на и изразяват самата идейно-духовна нагласа. Спираме се обаче в тази мъдрост, когато преценим, че сме измислили само рамкиращия проект за преобразуването на средата, тъй щото в събитието ни да остане щедро място за спонтанни и своевременни на протичането му възможности за доизмисляне на онова, което ще правим заедно с гостуващите участници. Провеждаме лекции, семинарно-дискусионни четения на забележителни за избраното движение текстове и на базата на тях измисляме художествени практики, чрез които наученото да бъде осъществено в преобразуване на пространството, атмосферата и отношенията между всички съ-творители - там, където ЧетворКръгленци са избрали фантазията да стане действителност. И накрая – заемаме се с направата на цялостната световъзприетивна сфера на идейно-духовната нагласа, тъй щото тя самата да стане основа и условие за художествено преживяване на всекидневието от страна на всички участници. Тазгодишното събитие на Четворкръг – „Въдворена Магия“ (от 01.07.2017 до 01.09.2017) Тази година ще разгърнем фантастичен свят през идеите и принципите на Магическия реализъм. Ще четем Борхес, Кортасар, Маркес, Павич, може би Радичков, както и други текстове, водещи смислово към магическия реализъм. Ще обсъждаме идеите им и ще ги вкореним и отглеждаме, както се гледат растения, в пространството на една къща и прилежащия й двор в село Камен. Част от рамкиращите проекто-практики, които ядрото на ЧетворКръг предварително е измислило (за да не оставяме спонтанността на самата себе си) са: 
лекции и семнинарно-дискусионни четения на текстове от Магическия реализъм, провеждани от ядрото на ЧетворКръг
рисуване, съпроводено със слушане на записана на аудиофайл поезия, близка до, или принадлежаща към самия магически реализъм
багрене на платове чрез техника, наречена „Шибури“;
поетично-маскарадни разходки (с предварително подготвени необичайни дрехи) до близката река
материализиране на фантастични същества по текстове на Борхес под формата на арт инсталации
приготвяне на домашна, магическа, нощна лютеница, на която ще четем поезия и на която ще свирим джаз, фънк, блус и други импровизационни дивотии, в съпровод на светлината от десетки свещи разположени из пространството на събитието, за да стане лютеницата наистина психотропна
работилница за ръчни тефтери, в които участниците ще бъдат насърчавани да записват сънищата си по време на събитието, като накрая всеки ще получава в собствения си тефтер ръкописните преписи от съновиденията на останалите присъстващи
и много други магичности, като – сюрреалистични техники за спонтанно писане, медитации на абсурда (чрез краткотрайно общуване на участниците с четене на фрази от различни книги), планетарно хоро, обръщане на денонощието, и още, че и повече изненади...
 За какво са ни нужни вашите магически хартийки (още известни като пари)? Материали. Материали. И материали. Та пак! За да осъществим всичко описано и замислено, ще са ни нужни доста художествени и други материали – фазери, бои, четки, тънкописци, около 2000 свещи, въжета и канапи, платове, глина, шантави дрехи, шапки и други дребошлъци, гориво, за да занесем всичко необходимо до мястото на събитието (например - ще носим около 700 книги, които ще разположим на различни места, като разчупена библиотека, из пространството на събитието), пък и немалко труд от наша страна, и още една купа сено съществени нужности :). Тъй като една от основните цели на събитията ни е цялостното всекидневие да се въведе в неговото художествено измерение, ще се погрижим и за наличието на основни хранителни продукти за всички гостуващи участници, тъй че да превърнем и храненето и приготовленията около него във вълшебен, общ акт – та магически хвърковати хартийки ни трябват и за тая работа. Разполагаме с малко по-малко от половината от нужните средства, които ще вложим в случването и ставането на събитието, а ако добрата ви воля настигне, или прехвърли заявеното като необходимо тук, ще ни помогнете да си донабавим нужното за тази година, онова, за началната подготовка на следващото ни събитие догодина, както и за евентуалната регистрация на ЧетворКръг като сдружение за всички по-нататъшни фантастично-поетични светоправения, които замисляме. Какво получавате насреща за вашата доброжелателната помощ?В дясно на страницата е описано какво ще получите в замяна на вашата помощ от финикийски тип :), а времето на получаване ще бъде между 10 и 20 дни след привършване на събитието, тъй като всички магически дарове ще бъдат изработени по време на протичането на „Въдворена магия“, изпълнени със заряда и лунатичността на онова, което правим. (тоест, очаквайте даровете между 10.09 и 20.09.2019).  Разбира се, може да ни пратите и сума по ваше усмотрение без да избирате някоя от посочените перки - като безвъзмездно дарение (минималният праг е 1$). Отвъд самите дарове и благодараности, отново след привършване на събитието, ще можете да разглеждате снимки и, евентуално - видео материали от събитието (в предоставената връзка към страницата ни във Фейсбук ) и да се радвате, че сте помогнали за случването на подобна естетическа дивотия. При добро стечение на обстоятелствата (разбирайте – при достатъчно добро доплуване на магическите ви хартийки до нас) ще направим изложба с част от създадените по време на събитието художествени предмети в Сливен и, може би, в София, за ставането на което също ще може да се веселите и радвате, и съобщавате тук и там, на тоз и онзи! При най-най-най-добротворните потоци на случването, пък, ще създадем драматургичен текст за постановка, основаващ се на съдържанието на всички записани по време на събитието сънища на участниците и евентуално ще може да се насладите на една лунно-пълна, съновиденческа, театрална церемония на фантазията, която, пак да напомним, вие сте омагьосали до случването й с финикийските си заклинания! Други възможни начини да ни направите магия за помощ Оставили сме връзка към страницата на ЧетворКръг във Фейсбук (най-горе в дясно, щракнете червеното About под заглавието на събитието) и ще се радваме на съвети, въпроси и всякакви други чуденки. Там ще може да ни питате каквото намерите за добре и да разберете повече подробности относно възможността за присъстващо участие на събитието „Въдворена магия“. Всеки от вас може да разпространява събитието във виртуалните социални мрежи или да говори за него в жизнените такива, за да стигнем до възможно повече добромислещи сърца и умове и да направим каквото сме намислили. Всяко разумно и сърцато фантазирано става действително, както не е казал Хегел.Четвъртитите кръгове да са с вас, благодарим   English starts here Engardened Magic                                                 ThursdaySquareCircle and magical realism in a village backyard, festival-art-practical-project-performance and other miscellanea,   01. 07.2017 – 01.09.2017, Kamen village, Sliven municipality, Bulgaria        What is ThursdaySquareCircle and how did we get here?                       We call it a core for rooting fantastical realism. Or to put it in other words – an interdisciplinary intellectual circle for creating temporary virtual marvelous worlds. A platform for realizing them. A workshop for vitalizing ideo-spiritual attunements in art and culture, such as romanticism and magical realism. An outdoorsy artistic practical, a festival, an educational method and a celebration of creativity – this is what our yearly events combine and interlace within themselves. ThursdaySquareCircle is the conceptual laboratory which projects these happenings, the main purpose of which is to transform and transmute their immediate surroundings in accordance with the perspectives of the ideo-spiritual attitude being explored.                           What are the origins of ThursdaySquareCircle? Heaps of reading, generous assistance from the mycelium of inspiration, the unfailing support of Monsieur Thursday (the day when our gatherings have been taking place over the past year), and last, but not least, our unquenchable inborn necessity for exploring collective forms of art.              Who are we, ThursdaySquareCirclers?                           Though we consider each participant in our events as a rightful member of ThursdaySquareCircle, our core remains strong through the continuous efforts of Monica Borissova (painter), Zahari Zahariev (philosopher, poet, writer), Denitsa Boeva (painter), Stratsimir Baryakov (philosopher, poet) and Dian Dinev (musician, photographer, painter). And all of the countless fireflies of imagination, which join their light with ours when we create worlds... What do we crazyhead ThursdaySquareCirclers do?                                Firstly, we select one of our beloved ideo-spiritual attitudes or a cultural/artistic movement and with the conjoint efforts of the circle‘s mental particle accelerator, we study their main ideas and principles. We choose a place and time for the happening, after which we start figuring out the ways in which the chosen spacetime can be reconfigured so as to suit and express the ideo-spiritual attunement. We stop once we have come upon a fitting frame for the transformative act, as we wish to leave ample space for spontaneous reimaginings which will befall us and the rest of the participants throughout the course of the event itself.  We conduct lectures, seminar readings of representative texts and come up with artistic practices based on those, so that what is learned is enacted in reconfiguring the space, atmosphere and relationship between all co-creators – there were ThursdaySquareCirclers have chosen for imagination to become reality. Finally, we take on ourselves the making of the world-perceiving domain of the ideo-spiritual attunement, so that it may become the basis and condition for the artistic experience of each participant’s daily living.                               This year’s event by ThursdayFourCircle – Engardened Magic (from 01.07.2017 to 01.09.2017)             This year, we shall unfold a fantastical world through the ideas and principle of magical realism. We’ll be reading Borges, Cortázar, Márquez, Pavić, Radichkov perhaps, as well as other texts inclined towards magical realism. We will discuss their ideas, root them and look after them, as one would take care of plants, in the space of a house and its yard in the Kamen village. Some of the framing project-practices, which the core of ThursdayFourCircle has pre-envisioned (so as to not leave spontaneity all to itself) are:                     
lectures and seminar formatted readings of magical realist texts led by the core of ThursdayFourCircle          
drawing under the accompaniment of audio recordings of poetry belonging to or reminiscent of magical realism      
textile dyeing using the Shibori technique        
poetic masquerade walks to the nearby river (making the use of provided unusual clothing and accessory items)     
 materializing Borges’s fantastical creatures in the shape of art installations   
making artisanal magical night liutenitsa (traditional Bulgarian chutney prepared from roasted peppers, tomatoes and spices). The process will include performing poetry to it, playing jazz, blues, funk and other improvised forms of madness, all under candlelight, so as to ensure the truly psychotropic quality of the liutenitsa.   
a workshop for making dream journals. Throughout the event, the participants will be encouraged to keep a record of their dreams, and by the end of it, they will walk away with a journal containing the handwritten narratives of other participants’ dreams as well.    
numerous other marvels, such as: surrealist techniques for spontaneous writing, meditations on the absurd conducted through the aid of reading parts of multiple books in a short time frame, planetary horo (Balkan group dances which wind in various shapes, most often a circle) , day and night reversal and many, oh so many more surprises...                 
What do we need your magical papers (a.k.a. money) for?  Materials. Materials. And more...materials. Yet again! To realize everything thus far described and thought out, we will require a panoply of artistic and practical supplies - canvases, paints, brushes, fine-liners, around 2000 candles, ropes and strings, fabrics, clay, eccentric clothes and accessories, fuel to transport everything to the event venue (such as the library of 700 books which will be spread across different spaces in our shared place), and a whole lot of other necessities. Not to mention the amount of effort and labor invested in the venture by its organizers. As one of the main goals of our events is to introduce an artistic dimension into our daily life, we will provide basic foodstuffs for all participants, so as to turn eating and its contingent preparations into an enchantment-laden, communal activity, and your magical papers are required to fulfill this intention. Currently, we have a bit under half of the necessary funds to realize the event. Should your generosity satisfy or surpass our estimates, any surplus thus accumulated will be put into the foundations of next year’s event, and maybe even the registration of ThursdayFourCirlce as a company dedicated to our further fantastical poetic worldmaking ventures.              What do you get in return for your benevolent support?                      To the right you’ll find descriptions of what you’ll receive in return for your shekels. Delivery of the said items will take place between 10 and 20 days of the event’s finale, as all magical gifts will be crafted during its course, and imbued with the charge and lunacy of what we do. That is to say, expect them between 10.09.2017 and 20.09.2017. Beyond that, once our doings are complete, you will be able to look through photos and perhaps even videos of the event on our Facebook page, to elevate your joy of having helped the happening of such an aesthetic curiosity. Should a plentiful rain of shekels fall upon us, we will organize an exhibition of our artistic creations in Sliven, and why not even Sofia? Do share the joy of these by spreading the word amongst the places and people you know! Should the precipitation of giving take us by surprise, we will respond to this flood by writing a theatre screenplay based on our participants’ recorded dreams. So your shekels will also bring you the enjoyment of a spectacle filled with the enchanting powers of the full moon and the visions of our dreamscapes.      Other ways of spellcasting your support of our cause             There’s a link to ThursdaySquareCircle’s Facebook page provided (click the red About, up and right of the page), we will appreciate and interact with your advice, questions, and miscellaneous ponderings. That’s also the portal through which you can find out more about attending the event as a participant. Each of you can spread the awareness of our doings virtually and by word of mouth, as we dearly want to fulfill our intentions and reach out to more benevolent heartminds out there. Each reasoned and spirited imaginary becomes actuality, as Hegel did not say. May the squared circles be with you, and many thanks!               Indiegogo Perks:   Here are the perks translated in English in the exact same order as they are in Bulgarian to the right of the page. If you have any questions feel free to contact us (Click the red About on the top right of the page)        4$ - One Hundred Ants The energy, that the ants are producing, Vladimir Vernadsky says(the creator of the notion of Biosphere), is a little bit smaller than the one produced by all the plants on planet Earth. If nothing else stops them(wide water surfaces, other insects and animal species etc.) they would spread out their colonies and seeds for plants across the whole planet for a few years . Lets use their power and be good-willed ants and help us approach our goal a bit by bit  - x1005$- Unrewarded donationYou shall forever stay in our hearts and minds as helpful elves working towards the cause of ThursdaySquareCircle’s development   10$ - Unrewarded donationYou shall even forever more stay in our hearts and minds as helpful elves working towards the cause of ThursdaySquareCircle’s development                  15$ - Unrewarded donationHere the eternity of our gratitude is guaranteed! You will never be forgotten as a good willed elf helper of ThursdaySquareCircle’s development and establishment20$ - Two jars of magical liutenitsaTwo 800ml jars of liutenitsa made by the event participants. Not just any old liutenitsa though, ours is special! Not only some of the ingredients are home-grown but also, we will play music and read poetry to it, during the night, under candle light – x2020$ - Decorative hanging (50x70cm)a Shibori dyed textile piece with additional handcrafted elements to adorn your wall, couch or bed – x10        50$ - Materializing a  Borges creatureYou pick seven days between the 3rd and 20th of August during which you’ll stay with us. In addition to the rest of the activities, you will be at the frontline of creating (with our humble assistance) an installation which brings one of Borges’s marvelous characters into the material domain. Materials, lodging and food all provided, be our guest! – x6    70$ - A4 paintingYou’ll receive an A4 painting made whilst the artist is listening to a recording of professional actors reading magical realist poetry. An experimental piece which explores the interaction between poetic language and imagery, with which you can beautify your home, office or atelier and tell the story of how you have become an accomplice in the contemporary European avant-garde art scene – x5   250$ - 100x70cm paintingA bigger piece created used the above-described technique, with which you can do as you please, but we recommend you keep it for the upcoming 30-40 years and watch its value grow at, mildly put, surprising rates – x5        350$ - 200x70cm paintingA bigger, longer LivePainted (painted whilst listening to poetry) painting which would make even the most ardent Japanese wall panel enthusiasts go green with envy. Use its marvelous abstractions as an aid to your meditations of contemporary, and may it be so,  meaningful art – x2  600$- 100x150cm hanging –A magical textile piece crafted throughout the duration of the event, with the input of multiple of our artists under the skilled supervision of Denitsa Boeva. The hanging you’ll receive will weave within itself the handprints of tens of people, intertwining the energies and meanings of Engardened Magic, so as to deliver them buzzing for your perception to dwell upon – x1

story:
Yoknapatawpha Arts Council

Founded in 1975 the Yoknapatawpha Arts Council remains committed to a diverse offering of artistic and cultural opportunities. Each year, YAC creates and delivers an exciting package of projects, programs and good works in the spirit of its mission to the community. Each year the staff, the board and volunteers work to present over 300 days of art programs ranging from students programs, exhibits by emerging artists, live theatre productions, concerts, classes, and independent film screenings.

Community Supported Art

The Yoknapatawpha Arts Council invites you to become part of the creative arts process by purchasing a share in its Community Supported Arts (CSA) program! The CSA is part of the Arts Incubator program that supports artists living and working in North Mississippi. When you purchase a share, you will receive a piece of artwork from the artist of your choice and be invited to a special reception to honor the CSA artists. You can follow your artist from initial idea through the creative process.  Connect with the unique stories that define our community!

The Impact

The Mississippi creative economy makes up 16% of the overall economy of the state and draws in over 22 million tourists.  Whether visiting the Blues Trail, attending Double Decker Festival, or an Oxford Art Crawl, the arts are big business and draw people together to engage in community building.  Last year arts organizations in Lafayette County spent over $2 million. The impact of the arts in our community isn’t just aesthetic, it economic!

story:
My name is Rome da Luce and I am an accomplished singer/songwriter and abstract expressionist painter. I have collaborated with some lovely women and couples over the last year to combine these two mediums with my new passion photography. In a celebration of creativity, art, and sensuality, I want to bring all of these creative avenues together and offer the first edition of this book to you as a collector's item.

 

I am seeking $7,000 to print 150-200 copies and ship them out as well as cover the costs of making select prints and postcards. I would also like to host a release party in Los Angeles where people can purchase the book in person while we all celebrate together. 

If I do not reach the goal, I will still order enough to ensure that everyone who contributed gets their order fulfilled. If we exceed the goal, then I will print more!! 

 

 

This is my first endeavor like this. I consulted with publishers but decided to do it independently because as an independent artist, for me, it is all about the cultivation of a more direct relationship with fans and supporters.

 

If you can't contribute monetarily but still want to support the project, please feel free to tell your friends about this campaign and share in your social media!

story:
Short Summary

We are Double Blind Surprise. We are here to be your magical gifting elves and to turn you into everyone's favorite gift-giver! With us, you'll never again have to see that "Oh, uh, thank you..." forced smile on your nephew's face when he opens your present. No, those days are in the past. We'll take on the stress; you get all the glory.

Adrienne Cook, our founder and Head Surpriser, is a mother, a fighter, and an artist herself with a Master's Degree in Fine Art. Throughout her time in school and in her art-world navigating life, she has been able to make connections with all manner of supremely talented and tireless artists who make awesome goods that you need to know about. Adrienne has always had a knack for giving personalized gifts and has developed this particular model of mutual surprise to bring that knowledge and skill to as many people as possible. Sharing is caring and she thinks you're great.

With your help, we can grow this idea to a wonderful reality where it's as fun to give a gift as it is to receive one, where artists can be artists and make everything a little bit sparklier, and a present is so much more than an obligation.

What We Need & What You Get

With the aid of your generous backing, we’ll be able to first and foremost expand the stockpile of goods from our stable of 75+ affiliated artists, creatives, and makers to better laser-target your gift-ee’s most perfect gift.  

Our maker cohorts reside all over the world, with a wide variety of goods—and with increased capital to stock up on the best stuff, we’ll be better able to select, send out, and solve your gift-giving problems. After padding our inventory, we plan to use our gains in support of work with our partner artists/makers to produce a series of Double Blind Surprise exclusive goods for gifts, special events, and holidays --just like the ones made fresh for backers of the first two levels of this campaign!

Everything we do and everything we are is here for the support of creatives, their endeavors, and all of us having fun while getting it done! We want Double Blind Surprise to be a platform where artists can grow their community and be seen by new people, and people can find new artists and makers they love!

 

The Impact

Remember when there was nothing more exciting than opening presents at your birthday party? Why did that stop? Because we're taller and busier and boring now? No, gifts should be just as fun as they've ever been!  We're tired of gift cards and buying the same stuff as everyone else, aren't you? Why not support small businesses, discover great new makers, and laugh your face off while you do it? You may be taller but you're NOT boring. We're here to help you remember that.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is having something in stock ready to be hand-picked for every person, every taste, and every style. We want to be able to grow to a place where we can be most confident that our goods will deliver a smile on both ends of the exchange, every. single. time. While we’ve already been hard at work, and gathered a substantial spectrum of goods, we know that it will take just a little more time, a few more big wholesale orders from our makers, and a flurry of excited social sharing from our kickoff backers to reach that place of optimum inventory and exposure.

We're always researching new makers and new products with great style and quality and we know with time and learning from you, our customers, this challenge can and will be conquered!
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Love the project but can't contribute right now? That's okay! Tell your friends! Tell your mom! Tell everyone around you by using social media to send people to our Indiegogo page with the Indiegogo share tools.  Every little bit helps and we'll love you forever.

THANK YOU!

A big big thanks to Zach and Jayme Waldt of Film Guy Productions for the video, to Alexa Hall for writing, to Glenn Potter and Wes Larsen of Tocco Creative for the website, and most of all, my long-suffering husband, Gregory Scott Cook,  for the thousand things that fell in his lap because he's good at everything.

story:
A beautifully hand drawn deck of 64 Daily Do It Cards to help you set your intention for the day ahead.

What if there was a way to help you start your day on the right foot ? To get your day going without letting everything get to you before it even happens ?

Have you ever wondered . . . .

  • Why things don’t go according to plan ?
  • Why you get so easily distracted ?
  • Why you lose your focus ?
  • Why things get in the way of doing what you want to do ?

What if there was a quick and easy way to help you

  • Stay focused ?
  • Stay on track ?
  • Help you keep your mind on the things important to you ?
  • Or simply give you something to think about for the day ahead ?

Well the good news is that there is a way to help you achieve these things and it’s something so simple that we don’t often think about it.

In fact, it’s something so quick that it literally takes you 10 seconds of your day to do yet creates something to focus on and get your mind engaged and ready.

And you can do it anywhere.

Any time.

Any how.

  • Whether you’re lying in bed having just opened your eyes.
  • Or waiting for the kettle to boil before your first cup of coffee in the morning.
  • On the tube or bus or in the car on the way to work.
  • It’s so simple, you could even do it while you’re sitting on the loo.

Wanna know what it is ?

Setting an intention for your day.

It’s the difference between having a productive, worthwhile day and one that’s well, that’s just another day towards the end of another year filled with missed opposrtunities and wishes for things you could have or should have done.

You might be asking – but what’s that got to do with anything ?

Well. If you don’t set an intention for your day or life, then someone (or something) else is going to come along and set it for you.

Here’s the thing.

Sometimes, it’s the smallest, simplest, seemingly too easy things that we don’t do.

It’s those things that we take for granted and yes, believe it or not, setting an intention is one of them.

But what is an intention you might be sitting there asking.

Well, for us, it’s 

  • An idea that you plan or intend to carry out
  • Something you mean to do
  • Your goal. Your aim. Your purpose.
  • How you choose to show up in any given period of time.

And we’ve seen how the small act of setting an intention at the start of your day really makes a difference.

So we’ve put something together for you that can be used, like we said earlier, any where, any time and any how.

A beautifully hand drawn deck of 64 Daily Do It Cards to help you set your intention for the day ahead.

Shuffle the deck and pick one first thing in the morning.

Having a wobbly moment – simply pick on to help re-shift your frame of mind and get you focused on something productive again.

Use them as a self coaching tool to help you uncover stumbling blocks, things that might be holding you back or simply to look at things with a fresh perspective.

Keep them next to your bed, in your bag and carry them with you or wherever you choose. 

Each deck comes with 64 totally unique cards, each with their own related intention for you to insert into your day.

The hardest part of it all ? 

Opening the box and shuffling them.

So if you’re ready to get your focus back on track, improve you productivity or simply have a tool to motivate and inspire you each day, then get involved today and with your help, you could have your very own deck in your hands in the next few weeks.

What We Need 

In order for us to make this a reality, we need your support to raise the funds to get the first batch of cards printed. We've searched around locally for printers to get these done for us and have managed to find someone who can help us through the whole project - from scanning in every single hand drawn image, adding in the relevant graphics and boxing them up.

To print small quantities is quite cost prohibitive so in order to keep the costs as low as possible right now, we would like to get a batch of 100 decks of cards printed out.

All the original A4 drawings are currently with the printers, waiting patiently for the GO button be pressed so to do this, we need to raise a minimum of 1,250.00 euros. 

This will help us cover the costs of getting the first batch printed, as well as covering shipment costs to fulfil orders

What's In The Deck

Each deck of cards will contain 64 totally unique cards, all of which have been hand drawn during a difficult time some years ago. 

We originally started using our prototype at our Retreat in Spain to help people create intentions or to be used as a prompt for journalling.

Personally, we use them every day, or even during difficult times.

They help us stay focused. They give us things to think about.

And without being all "woo woo" and "out there" they always seem to deliver just the right thing at just the right time. 

Here's what comes in each deck of cards:-

** 64 cards per set (A6 size 105mm x 148mm)
** Full colour double sided
** Custom printed faces with logo to reverse
** 320gsm smooth playing card stock
** Die cut to size with rounded corners
** Supplied with personalised tuck boxes that will have instructions printed on them too.

We are also currently finalising an Instruction Booklet that will be an electronic version available ONLY to people who purchase the cards. This Booklet will give you an insight as to how we interpret each card, but can also be used as a self coaching tool, giving you questions to think about that will open up your mind to a different way of thinking.

What If We Don't Reach Our Target

That's a difficult one because we really would like to make this a reality for everyone. Should we not reach our minimum target, we will have to look into how we can raise the balance to get everything printed - it's as simple as that for us but that could mean it might just take us a little bit longer than we hope.

What If We Exceed Our Target

We have some exciting plans and depending on how much we exceed the target by, we have another special product lined up that we have created which is ready to go.

The Feel Good Factor is a book we wrote some time ago and is a 250+ page book that combines elements of what we do at our Retreat in Spain to create something truly special.

It's a 29 Day Challenge, created to help you Feel Good Again and can be used in a number of different ways - use it as a coaching tool. Use it as an inspiration tool. Use it as a journal. The choice is yours really and we're finalising prices to get a limited edition printed so should we exceed our target by enough, we will be getting these printed.

The Impact

We have seen how the simple act of setting an intention can create a difference in how we approach our day and thanks to people who have been following us on Social Media, it's down to their constant requests that we are putting this together. 

They show up every day to see what card has been selected and have found that it really does help.

We will also be making a contribution to CALM (Campaign Against Living Miserably) who are a charity extremely close to our hearts so every deck sold will help break the stigma surrounding mental health and work towards reducing the suicide rate amongst men.

Risks & Challenges

Our BIGGEST challenge will be reaching our target and to be honest, it's why we have put off doing this before.

We get nervous. We worry what people will think. We question ourselves, just like everyone does.

But people have been asking and we simply want to put our beliefs into action by taking this small step towards helping people live healthier and happier lives.

All the hard work has, quite literally, been done.

Every single card drawn has taken at least 6 to 8 hours to complete - that's over 500 hours of drawing and doodling. About 3 SOLID weeks of sitting down, putting everything together.

Every single card has a deeply personal meaning and reason why it was drawn, all of which will be explained in the booklet that will accompany it online for you to access.

So the work is done and all that's waiting is that "money" part

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not in the position to make a full contribution, then we simply ask that you spread the word. 

Share it with as many people as you know.

Tell people about it and we will look into a way that we can reward you too.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I am Rabbie, a 26 year old queer and nonbinary freelance artist. Recently I lost my job due to discrimination, but that has just fueled my desire to kickstart my art and really inspired me to be even more proud of who I am.

this Kickstarter is so I can start making physical products, starting with this gay sticker. It will be 3x3 inches and matte. Try putting it on a phone, computer, notebook or folder to show where you stand!

What We Need & What You Get

  • I’m looking to raise $500, which will go towards the stickers, cute packaging for customers, and business cards to be sent with merchandise. Any extra will go directly to creating more products.
  • Everyone who contributes $5 will get a sticker sent directly to them.
  • Those who contribute $10 will get a sticker and an hd phone background for pride, just make sure you tell me which identity you’d like. (Availability: Gay, Lesbian, Bi, Trans, Nonbinary, Aro and Ace)

The Impact

  • This project will directly help me reach new supporters and help me kickstart a career I’ve worked hard towards.

Risks & Challenges

  • I admittedly have a smaller amount of followers currently. However, the more that I release, the more I connect with others, and I truly believe I can get this funded.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share my posts with everyone you can on every site you can! 
  • follow me! Rabbie Dee Draws on FB, Rabbiedavis on Twitter, and Rabbiedee on Instagram!
     

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Introducing ImaginAble creative playsets by Able Media Co.

These two patent pending products are the perfect way to develop one of a kind posters and T-shirts you can be proud to show off.

Like pages from a coloring book, ColorClings feature line illustrations for people of all ages to enjoy coloring. Only these patent pending adhesive backed pages stick directly to your wall door or any smooth service allowing users to color from a more comfortable upright position. They are larger than a standard coloring book and come four pages to a pack. The temporal adhesive backing allows you to keep these colorful collages on display for years – or they can be removed and replaced whenever you choose.

Mr.T-Shirt is a patent pending mix-and-match product, which allows users to print a unique face on a T-shirt. Combine eyes, mouths, beards, and accessories to design a character as silly or serious as you’d like. Each Mr. T-Shirt set comes with three blank T-shirts, and 12 facial elements to mix, match, and print. The elements are iron-on adhesive, so parental supervision is required. But when finished you’ll have not just one, but three brand new comfy T-shirts for you to wear proudly about.

For each of these products, Able Media Co. is devoted to bringing you plenty of options to create from, but I am limited to my own creations and what’s in the public domain. Design options include The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, the Able Media original WrestleVerse, and US Presidents; with more to come.

That's where this campaign comes in. Through my art and wrestling careers I have made connections across many states with other artists and wrestlers, and I’d like to put their works and their likenesses on these products. Plus, like most people around the country I’m also a fan of pop culture. And I’d love to see huge brands associated with these products. I’d like to see them become the next big collectables available in retail stores with everybody’s favorite super heroes, athletes, princesses, and cartoon characters as options to create from.
So I need your help.

If the campaign reaches $5,000 I will announce the first series of licensed artwork, and distributors attached for future release.

If the campaign reaches $10,000 I will purchase a new printer, computer, and operating system in order to produce ImaginAble content more efficiently.

If the campaign reaches it’s $15,000 goal I will be hiring additional artists to create designs for products AND I'll use this campaign as a pitch to the biggest retailers and brands around.

story:
UPDATE 10/15/20 : LAST CHANCE

We are coming to the end of the fundraiser. This is your last chance to get some fresh DB swag before it's all gone. 

The Dirty Beetles camp and Boog Art Car needs your support.

It's been a strange year to say the least, but we need continue to move forward.
So we got to pull up our socks and help each other get thru this crazy time.
 

Usually this time of year we throw events that support our yearly expenses (insurance, storage, utilities etc.) But with no events happening this year or in the near future, we are falling short of goal.  So we are looking to our friends and family for help....

We've created a new line of Dirty Beetle 2020 perks and gifts made exclusively for this drive to help raise some funds. This will be the only run of these so get them while you can.

You still have time to help support us and pick up some of our newest DB swag in the process.

We’d love to see all of our Dirty Beetle friends rocking it on their block.


Please give what you can every dollar goes to help pay the bills and keep the lights on. Help us get thru this rough patch and look sexy doing it.

 

Grab a perk or donate any amount.

even $5 will help. 

 

THANKS 

 

UPDATE 9/18/20 : WE DID IT !!!

We went virtual. We live streamed over 50+ DJ sets during Burn week. The 3D renderings came out looking amazing! Thanks to everyone that supported us during this new experience.

You can check out some of the saved streams you might have missed @ the Dirty Beetle Twitch page: https://www.twitch.tv/dirtybeetles 

 

Also : last chance to grab our limited edition 2020 Dirty Beetle Swag

 

 

 

UPDATE: 8/31/20

WE ARE LIVE

www.INFINITE PLAYA.com

 

Boog Art Car has gone virtual & beyond.....

 

Join the Dirty Beetles on an adventure like nothing we’ve done before.

 

Over 10 years ago a small group of miscreants coined the named “Dirty Beetles", since then it has become a name internationally know with having fun and bringing a warm welcoming family vibe to the playa and beyond. Together we created  The Boog Art Car Project  converting a Short School Bus (that was the school bus on Catalina island) into a rolling piece of art & DJ booth. It's been a long strange trip.... 

Now we are seeking funding for our trip to the virtual playa. 

 

In the current state where everything feels broken, we strive to connect in new ways to expand our connectivity, individually and as a whole. After seeing the new technology that is emerging participating in one of the 8 Virtual Burns happening this month and also debut the new design our Art Car was sorting we wanted to apart of. 

So we have commissioned artists to create 3-D renderings of our newest version of The Boog Art Car Project

 

Additionally our annual camp is typically funded  through a series of event based fundraisers and yearly camp dues. However with the absence of all events happening this year, and the burn cancelled our primary source of income for running the camp and coving our yearly maintenance costs has also been lost. So in the absence of these things we decided to press on anyway and make all the normal Burning Man camp swag that we usually make and give them as gifts for those who donate and help make our virtual dream a virtual reality.

With your donation you are helping us bring BOOG art car to life and to the virtual burn. We will be apart of 1 of 8 virtual burns this year, ours is called “Infinite Playa” . With your help we insure that our special brand of WILDLIFE reaches every corner of the globe and we can still be part of the Burning Man culture we love. 

Into the unknown.....

Honestly we have no idea what the impact of this VR gathering will be, we are sailing towards uncharted territory. But the thought of the "Dirty Beetles" not being represented at the burn at all this year is something we all agreed we weren’t ready for. So for now our aim is to be apart of this new emerging technology and get the art car to the burn virtually. As part of this virtual experience we will be able to move around the VR playa and have live performances streamed from the DJ booth just as it would be on the real playa. We will be posting DJ line ups and performances soon. There will be a free 2D version that is accessible by anyone as well as a 3D interactive world for a fee. Check out the website “Infinite Playa”  for more info.  

Our goal is to raise $5000 dollars to cover the 3D rendering costs, storage fees for all camp gear and cost of creating the perks. Anything we make over that goal will go to repairs, maintenance and rebuilding of the new design with the plan to  bring Boog Art Car out to the real playa in 2021.

This is a low risk year for the Dirty Beetles, but a high reward if we can all unite virtually around the most magical art car ever created. 

We realize money is tight and not everyone can donate... so how can you help?

We know through the absence of what we do how essential our social community is.. So please share this on your favorite social media platform and tell a friend or two..If you ever had a magical night on “Boog” or if you kicked it with some Dirty Beetles at one of our events and it felt like family, but you can’t donate, help us get the word out… it's really simple.  

You can use the share tools on the Indigogo page or copy and paste the link. 

Thanks for listening and  lets HELP MAKE DIRTY BEETLES GO VIRTUAL !!!

However with the absence of all events happening this year, and the burn cancelled our primary source of income for running the camp and coving our yearly maintenance costs has also been lost. So in the absence of these things we decided to press on anyway and make all the normal Burning Man camp swag that we usually make and give them as gifts for those who donate and help make our virtual dream a virtual reality.With your donation you are helping us bring BOOG art car to life and to the virtual burn. We will be apart of 1 of 8 virtual burns this year, ours is called “Infinite Playa” . With your help we insure that our special brand of WILDLIFE reaches every corner of the globe and we can still be part of the Burning Man culture we love. Into the unknown.....Honestly we have no idea what the impact of this VR gathering will be, we are sailing towards uncharted territory. But the thought of the "Dirty Beetles" not being represented at the burn at all this year is something we all agreed we weren’t ready for. So for now our aim is to be apart of this new emerging technology and get the art car to the burn virtually. As part of this virtual experience we will be able to move around the VR playa and have live performances streamed from the DJ booth just as it would be on the real playa. We will be posting DJ line ups and performances soon. There will be a free 2D version that is accessible by anyone as well as a 3D interactive world for a fee. Check out the website “Infinite Playa”  for more info.  Our goal is to raise $5000 dollars to cover the 3D rendering costs, storage fees for all camp gear and cost of creating the perks. Anything we make over that goal will go to repairs, maintenance and rebuilding of the new design with the plan to  bring Boog Art Car out to the real playa in 2021.This is a low risk year for the Dirty Beetles, but a high reward if we can all unite virtually around the most magical art car ever created. We realize money is tight and not everyone can donate... so how can you help?We know through the absence of what we do how essential our social community is.. So please share this on your favorite social media platform and tell a friend or two..If you ever had a magical night on “Boog” or if you kicked it with some Dirty Beetles at one of our events and it felt like family, but you can’t donate, help us get the word out… it's really simple.  You can use the share tools on the Indigogo page or copy and paste the link. Thanks for listening and  lets HELP MAKE DIRTY BEETLES GO VIRTUAL !!!

story:
This project has been funded so now this is an opportunity to pre-order and get this deck in your hands.

Sooooo 2020 has been a wild ride, no? ...and to think, we're only half-way through.

I feel like we are witnessing a pivotal moment in history that as an artist, I have a responsibility to document. We are at an interesting place in time - an intersection of the past, present and future.

 

"An artist’s duty, as far as I’m concerned, is to reflect the times. I think that is true of painters, sculptors, poets, musicians. As far as I’m concerned, it’s their choice, but I CHOOSE to reflect the times and situations in which I find myself. That, to me, is my duty. And at this crucial time in our lives, when everything is so desperate, when everyday is a matter of survival, I don’t think you can help but be involved. Young people, black and white, know this. That’s why they’re so involved in politics. We will shape and mold this country or it will not be molded and shaped at all anymore. So I don’t think you have a choice. How can you be an artist and NOT reflect the times? That to me is the definition of an artist." ~Nina Simone

2020 Visions Tarot represents many things. The visions that I'm receiving as a clairvoyant and intuitive, what I'm actually seeing on the news and in my day to day life and the fact that clarity has been gained ironically from chaos and confusion. Who needs 20/20 hindsight when you're TRULY PRESENT in 2020?

The focus on the 22 Major Arcana only for this deck is deliberate. I feel it represents the significance of this year as well as the energies we are seeing play out in real time

 

My goal is to use my art to bring awareness to the parallels of life and tarot while touching on subject matter that is rarely highlighted in divination/spirituality. I believe we are all here to grow and in this deck I am using my art to stay true to the structure of tarot, but in an unconventional (sometimes challenging, sometimes humorous) way.

 

2020 Visions Tarot will feature 23 cards (all Major Arcana + a bonus card) gilded edges, a detailed full color guidebook and hardcover box. The cards will measure approximately 2.75” x 4.75" on 350gsm card stock. I take pride in the quality of my products and this will be no exception. 

Who Am I?

My name is Krystal Banner and I am the CEO/Founder of Kaleidadope. I am an intuitive, creator and entrepreneur who is passionate about bringing imagery and themes to life with color and culture. I have created my own collection of decks including tarot, oracle and affirmations. I choose some projects, but some projects choose me - I feel this is the latter. I was inspired by recent events and divine guidance to birth this project am excited to see it to completion. I use my art to encourage discussion and challenge people to dig deeper, while still incorporating my sense of humor and love for color. 

Website: http://kaleidadope.com

Press: http://kaleidadope.com/pages/press

IG: @kaleidadope | @kaleidadopetarot

Timing

Right now the deck is estimated to be completed in time to be submitted for production in September. The goal would be to start shipping in November. As we know, 2020 has been full of curve balls so there could possibly be delays due to unknown variables. The ultimate goal is to have this completed and delivered before the end of 2020.

Risks & Challenges

There is little to no risk other than unexpected delays due to COVID-19 and/or whatever else comes up this year. Being that 2020 is full of unknowns, I do ask for patience in that regard if it does impact the timeline of the project.

story:
Help Bring Plants and Beers To
Life With Beer Garden Goods

Three years ago I started @PlantsandBeers to share two of my two favourite things—Plants and Beers! Many houseplants, craft beers, two sold-out Succulent Garden Workshops and a community of over 5,00 plant and beer lovers later, Plants and Beers is ready to GROW!

Like a root-bound plant that needs a new pot, Plants And Beers is ready to find a new home at your home with Beer Garden Goods!

  • Stickers, Posters, Pins and Cards
  • Tote Bags to hold your Plants and Beers
  • Glassware, Costers, Bottle Openers
  • UpCycled Beer Bottle and Growler Plant Gardens 
  • Virtual and In-Person Plants and Beers Workshops
  • Macrame Plant Hangers and Wall Art


Every Donation of $10 or More=1 Plants & Beers Sticker
Plus Plant Parent Perks & More! 


The Seed Is Planted, It Just Needs Some
Sun and Water aka YOU!
 

Every Supporter (min $10) will receive One "Plants and Beers" Sticker in the mail plus a handwritten note of heartfelt Thanks. Other Supporter Perks also include a Virtual Plant Parent Boot Camp and one year of yours truly as your Personal Plant Pro to answer all your plant-related questions! 

WHAT YOUR FUNDING WILL HELP GROW:

 

PLANTS & BEERS STICKERS

These fun  Plants and Beers stickers are eco-friendly Green Gold Certified and printed locally in Toronto. Slap'em onto your notebook, laptop, phone etc! Your support will help fund the printing of all designs, plus eco-friendly packaging and delivery. 

 

TOTE BAGS, GLASSWARE AND MORE!
*COMING SOON With Your Help*

 

 

YOU SUPPORT WILL ALSO
HELP ME INVEST IN

  • Supplies for Workshops across Ontario and Virtually 
  • An Ecommerce Website
  • Eco-Friendly Packaging
  • Graphic Design
  • Advertising
  • Creating  New Products and Inventory 

Our "current new normal" has rooted my belief in the power of Community and inspired me to help you bring more Nature into your Life and Home with a side of Craft Beer.

Your Support (aka the Sun and Water) will help my garden grow and launch Green Garden Goods with its first line of products. Any Support past my $500 goal with go into invest in future growth and products.


WHAT WE STAND FOR

By supporting Beer Garden Goods you are also supporting: 
THE ENVIRONMENT | We Make the most Eco-Friendy Choice Every Time 
LOCAL | Sourcing and Supporting Local and Independent Business, Suppliers and Creators Whenever Possible  
DIVERSITY + INCLUSION | Plants and Beers Are For Everyone
COMMUNITY | Building Community Through Local Craft Beer, Beverages and Houseplants

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
MY BEER GARDEN GROWN

  • Share Socially and tag me on Instagram @plantsandbeers
  • Tell your fellow Plant and Beer Lovers


THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary & Who We Are

Oklahoma is a state full of culture, history and talent. With growing metropolitan areas and a budding local economy, now more than ever is the perfect time to create something big.  That's why we, a handful of local college students and the owner of Muscle Car Ranch, want to put on an event where Oklahoma artists not only get to showcase their talents, but other Oklahomans will also get to come together to experience much of what this great state has to offer.  This is a big endeavor that we are all very passionate about but we can't do it without your help!

Twister Fest will be a multi-day event free of division lines.  We want to showcase all genres of music: indie, alternative, rock, hip hop, country, bluegrass and much more!  There will be booths set up where artists can display and sell their original works. Local Oklahoma food trucks and an Oklahoma brewer will be selling food and drink throughout the entire festival.  To those who purchase two day passes, you will be able to camp out for the entire weekend, starting on Friday and ending on Sunday.

Muscle Car Ranch has hosted a plethora of music events in the past, with acts such as: Jefferson Starship, Ambrosia, Dr. Hook, The Turtles, Lovin' Spoonful and so much more!  Curtis Hart, owner of the Ranch has taken a couple of years off to develop and improve his land to where this next level could be possible.  He has added two more stages to his property and is ready to take this festival head on. 

Dallas Howard and Devin Murphy are two students from Oklahoma City University who are very passionate about music, especially within the local scene.  Dallas is a music composition senior who has put on music events of a smaller caliber, but is ready to make something truly exciting.  He is from the LA area and has had many good experiences at various festivals around the country and is excited to bring something truly special to his new home in Oklahoma.

Devin is a business marketing senior who is very passionate about supporting the arts in Oklahoma.  She was an intern at the Oklahoma Film and Music Office, danced for years with the Ballet Oklahoma School of Dance (now OKC Ballet) and was also a founding member of the Teen Oklahoma City Arts Council. Now she is excited to help continue to bring attention and exposure to the talent she sees in her state.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for both corporate sponsorships and crowdsourcing donations to help cover the immense cost of this event. We are trying to reach at least $100,000 of that through crowdsourcing. We hope that you will feel just as passionate about supporting local talent as we do.  Every little donation counts so please consider offering your support!  With your help we will be able to cover:
  • Down payments to get acts to the festival (This is the largest cost)
  • Covering liability costs that must be made in order for us to allow for patrons to camp out
  • Staff and volunteer compensation
  • Legal costs
  • Costs of having medical assistance on site
  • Security costs
  • Light and Sound for the stages
Donation perks are as follows:
  • Any donation of $100 and up will let you have your choice of land for camping out during the festival as well as a food voucher to any of the food trucks there
  • Any donation of $500 and up will let you meet our headliner (TBA)
  • Any donation of $1000 and up will get your name listed among our sponsors
All donations will be going to a separate account set up specifically for financing this festival.

The Impact

We hope for this even to be successful enough for us to be able to provide Oklahoma with a purely local and unique music and arts festival with the fun camping and activity based atmosphere.  With your help we can make this a reality.

Risks & Challenges

Obviously there is a fair amount of risk because this is a brand new idea and it is of a massive scale, however, with your support, we promise to create something unique, fun and new.  With Curtis's expertise of music events, and with the dedication of Dallas and Devin, we can promise you an experience you will not want to miss.  If we don't reach our goal we will have to scale down our operations, but with hopes that you and those you know are willing to lend your support, this will not be something we will have to do.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot make a fiscal contribution please don't think this means your cannot assist us on our journey to make Twister Fest a reality! Please help us in getting the word out and share this campaign with your friends. Indiegogo offers a variety of share tools to help make this possible.  Also if you would be interested in volunteering your time or knowledge to the cause, then you can contact Devin Murphy on her email devdear93@gmail.com.  Also please consider purchasing tickets to the event as soon as they become live!

We hope you can help in any way you can! With appreciation and warm regards from us to you,

-Twister Fest Staff
